answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Well, even if you had been exposed to feron, it should not leave any lasting effect. Generalized feeling of a burning sensation can be due to dry skin, hyperthyroid states, liver or gall bladder dysfunction, peripheral neuropathies as in diabetes or decreased sweating as in Sjogren’s syndrome. This would need a comprehensive investigation.If all these are ruled out, then maybe you will need to consult a toxicology expert.Take care!
